title: Something to hide
brief_description: Harry Field’s (Peter Finch) life is turned into a nightmare when he offers a hitch-hiker (Linda Hayden) a lift. His problems are exacerbated by marital problems and alcoholism. Also starring Shelley Winters, Colin Blakely, John Stride and Linda Hayden. Also known as “Shattered” and based on the book by Nicholas Monsarrat.
